info.title: WiiRayTracer
info.author: TheBlasphemer
info.description: Paints silly bubbles on your screen
info.details:
What's it do?
It paints silly bubbles on your screen.

What's the purpose?
I wanted to experiment with Wii development, and figured
something nice to start off with would be to port a
raytracing engine I had made earlier for university work.

What does it use?
The raw framebuffer + a shitload of vector functions.

Further info:

The book that I prefer when it comes to 3d-graphics programming:
	"Fundamentals of computer graphics" (second edition)
	by Peter Shirley
	(the one with the big tiger up front)
	
Original java assignment this was based on:
	http://www.cs.uu.nl/docs/vakken/gr/lab1.html
	
Feel free to contact me at tb [at] stuffplug.com

have fun poking around in the source code!
